meta.description: Transportation mode selection to minimize pollution

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution units per trip for each mode

params.name: capacity
params.description: Product capacity per trip for each mode

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of trips for each mode

vars.name: y
vars.description: y[m] = 1 if mode m is chosen, 0 otherwise

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(pollution[m] * x[m] for m in MODES)
objective.description: Minimize total pollution from all trips

constraints.name: choose_two_modes
constraints.description: Only two modes of transportation can be chosen

constraints.name: product_transport_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(capacity[m] * x[m] for m in MODES)
constraints.description: At least 300 units of products must be transported

constraints.name: total_trip_limit
constraints.description: Total number of trips must be less than or equal to 20

constraints.name: mode_activation_motorcycle
constraints.description: Motorcycle trips are limited by its activation

constraints.name: mode_activation_small_truck
constraints.description: Small truck trips are limited by its activation

constraints.name: mode_activation_large_truck
constraints.description: Large truck trips are limited by its activation
